info.description: Search LinkedIn for jobs, companies and more, easily extract structured data from public LinkedIn pages, no login, cookies, or session management required. This API is ideal for developers, recruiters, data analysts, and job platforms looking to integrate real-time LinkedIn data.
info.name: LinkedIn API

item.description: Get a list of jobs, use the `/v1/jobs/get` for full details on a specific job.
item.name: Search and list jobs

query.description:
**Optional**

Keywords, job-title, company-name, position or any other relevant search-query.

**Optional**

ID of organizations like companies and schools the job-postings should be from, use the `Search and list organization IDs` endpoint for valid IDs. Will return everything by default.

**Allowed format**

^\d+(;\d+)*;?$

**Optional**

Location of the job offer, like country or city. Will be `Worldwide` if empty.

**Optional**

The maximum age of when a result was added to LinkedIn, will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

month, week or day

**Optional**

Filter by job-types, like fulltime, contractor, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

contractor, fulltime, parttime, intern or temporary separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Filter by experience-levels, like intern, director, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

intern, entry, associate, midSenior or director separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Filter by workplace-types, like remote, hybrid, etc. Multiple values are possible and need to be separated by semicolon (;). Will return everything by default.

**Allowed values**

remote, hybrid or onSite separated by a semicolon (;)

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

**Optional**

**Allowed format**

**Optional**

**Optional**

The maximum age of when a result was added to LinkedIn, will return everything by default.

month, week or day

**Optional**

**Optional**

item.description: Get job details by its ID, use the `/v1/jobs/search` endpoint to search for jobs.
item.name: Get job details

query.description:
**Required**

ID of the job, to get allowed values, use the `search` endpoint.

**Allowed format**

^\d+$

response.body:
{
  "_links": {
    "self": "/v1/jobs/get?id=4344905017"
  },
  "data": {
    "acceptingApplications": true,
    "applicants": 200,
    "companyName": "Netflix",
    "description": "Netflix Animation Studios is on a mission...",
    "employmentType": "Full-time",
    "id": "4344905017",
    "industries": "Entertainment Providers",
    "jobFunction": "Other",
    "linkedinCompanyName": "netflix",
    "linkedinUrl": "https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/hr-coordinator-netflix-animation-studios-at-netflix-4344905017",
    "location": "Burbank, CA",
    "postedTimeAgo": "2 weeks ago",
    "seniorityLevel": "Not Applicable",
    "title": "HR Coordinator - Netflix Animation Studios"
  },
  "errors": [],
  "hasError": false,
  "hasWarning": false,
  "warnings": []
}
response.name: Successful response

query.description:
**Required**

ID of the job, to get allowed values, use the `search` endpoint.

**Allowed format**

^\d+$

item.description: Get a list of organization IDs, use the IDs in the organizationIds in `/v1/jobs/search` to filter by companies or schools.
item.name: Search and list organization IDs

query.description:
**Required**

Organization name or query, can be companies or schools, etc.

response.name: Successful response

query.description:
**Required**

Organization name or query, can be companies or schools, etc.

item.description: Get company LinkedIn names and short descriptions, use the `/v1/companies/get` endpoint with the linkedinName to get the full details.
item.name: Search and list companies

query.description:
**Required if token is not set**

Name of the organization to find.

**Optional**

Companies can create sites for specific countries, use this parameter if you want a page made for a specific country, or leave it to get the default result.

**Allowed format**

^[A-Za-z]{2}$

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as `meta.nextToken`.

response.name: Successful response

query.description:
**Required if token is not set**

Name of the organization to find.

**Optional**

Companies can create sites for specific countries, use this parameter if you want a page made for a specific country, or leave it to get the default result.

**Allowed format**

^[A-Za-z]{2}$

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as `meta.nextToken`.

item.description: Get company details by its LinkedIn name, use the `/v1/companies/search` to get valid LinkedIn names.
item.name: Get company details

query.description:
**Required**

LinkedIn name of the company, to get allowed values, use the `$path/search` endpoint.

**Optional**

Companies can create sites for specific countries, use this parameter if you want a page made for a specific country, or leave it to get the default result.

**Allowed format**

^[A-Za-z]{2}$

response.body:
{
  "_links": {
    "self": "/v1/companies/get?linkedinName=google"
  },

response.name: Successful response

query.description:
**Required**

LinkedIn name of the company, to get allowed values, use the `$path/search` endpoint.

**Optional**

Companies can create sites for specific countries, use this parameter if you want a page made for a specific country, or leave it to get the default result.

**Allowed format**

^[A-Za-z]{2}$

item.description: Get the company feed and posts, including text, videos and images.
item.name: Get company feed

query.description:
**Required**

Get the token from the `/v1/companies/get` endpoint or from the `meta.nextToken`. Important: This token will expire after some time.

response.name: Successful response

query.description:
**Required**

Get the token from the `/v1/companies/get` endpoint or from the `meta.nextToken`. Important: This token will expire after some time.
